alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Benton; Prentiss; Tippah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 11:32AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Union, northwestern Pontotoc, northwestern Lee, Tippah, eastern Benton, northwestern Prentiss, western Alcorn, Hardeman, western McNairy, southeastern Haywood, Madison and southwestern Chester Counties through 1215 PM CDT... At 1131 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Hillville to near Canaan to near Pinedale. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jackson, New Albany, Henderson, Bolivar, Ripley, Selmer, Chickasaw State Park, Chickasaw State Forest, Big Hill Pond State Park, Saltillo, Whiteville, Blue Mountain, Ecru, Jumpertown, Silerton, Masseyville, Theo, New Harmony, Hillville and Pocahontas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
